Name: deer hunter II
About the game: An archaeological survival/exploration game. Wake up in a desert and learn to survive. Avoid exposure, snake bites and dehydration as you hunt for resources and loot corpses of those who came before you. Craft new items, discover new sights and grow stronger to take on your final challenge...
